name: bup-cli
excerpt: A basic windows tool that backs up folders in .zip files.
description:
A basic CLI tool to back up folders as .zip files on your Windows PC.


Commands

bUp provides several terminal commands to manage folder backups. Each command can be invoked using its full name or its first letter.

  • bup add/a [path] - Adds new folder to be backup up.
  • bup del/d - Remove a folder from being backed up.
  • bup list/l - Show a list of all folders that get backed up.
  • bup set/s - Sets directory where bUp stores its backups.
  • bup run/r - Runs the backup process.
